graph_title: Number of sustainable tourism strategies or policies and implemented action plans with agreed monitoring and evaluation tools
indicator_name: Implementation of standard accounting tools to monitor the economic and environmental aspects of tourism sustainability
target_name: 일자리 창출 및 지역 문화 및 상품을 홍보하는 관광업의 지속가능발전 영향을 모니터링 하는 도구 개발 및 이행
page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
title: Number of sustainable tourism strategies or policies and implemented action plans with agreed monitoring and evaluation tools
target: Develop and implement tools to monitor sustainable development impacts for sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products
